description: My client today insisted at meeting outside. The weather was not the best so I was a bit pissed to wait for him somewhere in the middle of nowhere. He was 5 minutes late but when I saw him I was sure that the waiting was worth it. I also realized why we met outside. He temporarily lived in a hostel as he had to hide from his creditors. Basically he only owed 27 000 CZK to one person. But as the debts were overdue he now has the last chance of paying it within two weeks. I was sure that he would be happy from my offer to not just lend him but give him the money. Of course for sex in return. But instead he was arrogant and even a bit aggressive. So I changed my strategy and offered him more than he owed. Would he let me have his little straight ass?
title: Debt Dandy 102
